lemma ProjIsoSpec.toSpec_apply' (x : Proj| pbo f) :
    (toSpec f_deg hm).1.base x = ProjIsoSpecTopComponent.toSpec 𝒜 f x := by
  apply PrimeSpectrum.ext
  show Ideal.comap (awayToGamma f_deg hm) (Ideal.comap (ΓToStalk (Proj| pbo f) x)
    (LocalRing.maximalIdeal ((Proj| pbo f).presheaf.stalk x))) =
    Ideal.comap (algebraMap (A⁰_ f) (Away f))
      (x.1.asHomogeneousIdeal.toIdeal.map (algebraMap A (Away f)))
  let F : (Proj| pbo f).presheaf.stalk x →+* Localization.AtPrime x.1.asHomogeneousIdeal.toIdeal :=
    RingHom.comp (algebraMap (HomogeneousLocalization.AtPrime 𝒜 x.1.asHomogeneousIdeal.toIdeal) _)
      (RingHom.comp (Proj.stalkIso' 𝒜 x.1).toRingHom
    ((Proj.toLocallyRingedSpace 𝒜).toPresheafedSpace.restrictStalkIso (Opens.openEmbedding _) x).hom)
  have : (LocalRing.maximalIdeal _).comap F = (LocalRing.maximalIdeal _) := sorry
  let g : Away f →+* Localization.AtPrime x.1.asHomogeneousIdeal.toIdeal :=
    IsLocalization.map _ (RingHom.id _) (show Submonoid.powers f ≤
    x.1.asHomogeneousIdeal.toIdeal.primeCompl.comap (RingHom.id _) from Submonoid.powers_le.mpr x.2)
  have hg : g.comp (algebraMap A _) = algebraMap A _ := IsLocalization.map_comp _
  have hg' : F.comp ((ΓToStalk (Proj| pbo f) x).comp (awayToGamma f_deg hm)) =
    g.comp (algebraMap (A⁰_ f) (Away f)) := by sorry
  have hg'' : x.1.asHomogeneousIdeal.toIdeal.map (algebraMap A (Away f)) =
      (LocalRing.maximalIdeal _).comap g := by
    apply Function.LeftInverse.injective (IsLocalization.map_comap (Submonoid.powers f) _)
    simp only [← Localization.AtPrime.map_eq_maximalIdeal, Ideal.comap_comap, hg]
    rw [IsLocalization.comap_map_of_isPrime_disjoint (Submonoid.powers f) _ _ inferInstance,
      IsLocalization.comap_map_of_isPrime_disjoint
        x.1.asHomogeneousIdeal.toIdeal.primeCompl _ _ inferInstance]
    · exact Set.disjoint_compl_left_iff_subset.mpr subset_rfl
    · rw [Ideal.disjoint_powers_iff_not_mem]
      exact x.2
      exact Ideal.IsPrime.isRadical inferInstance
  rw [← this, hg'', Ideal.comap_comap, Ideal.comap_comap, Ideal.comap_comap, hg']
